owner.username: Galt Museum & Archives on The Commons

title._content: Royal North West Mounted Police and Visitors Outside the Writing-On-Stone Detachment

description._content: 1916 25 x 20 cm Black and white copy print Photograph shows Royal Canadian Mounted Police Officers and their guests posing outside the Writing On Stone Detachment. from left to right: ?, Special Constable R. E. Lipton, Constable H. Moorehouse, Max Neilsen (Coutts area farmer), Ted Humphrey (Writing On Stone homesteader), ?. The Writing On Stone Interpretive Centre has an original postcard photo in their collection which was donated to them by Ted Humphrey. A member of their staff provided us with the above information,August 1993. To obtain high quality and larger reproductions of this image please visit the Galt Museum & Archives website: www.galtmuseum.com/archives.htm and include thIs number in your request: P19760233057
